content: reusable water balloon pattern no picking up water balloon bits or worrying about critters getting into the schnibblies make a whole bunch out of one skein of bernat blanket **skill level** easy **finished size** approximately 5 high approximately 3 wide **materials** -bernat blanket yarn rainbow shine colorway was used in photographed sample -us size k-10 5 6 5mm crochet hook -yarn needle
